criteria_widgets.info_text_averagePerformance: Average number of task units performed for 1 audit hour. Task unit = 1 completed task multiplied by a special coefficient that considers the task complexity, number of task solutions, and the website/website group for which the task was performed.
criteria_widgets.info_text_supportAndAuditsTime: Sum of hours spent for the audits and support tasks.
criteria_widgets.info_text_hoursCorrespondence: Ratio of the hours spent for audits in Jira and time spent for audits in the system

points_widget.totalPoints_info_text: Total Points = (Average Performance * Average validity) * (Support/Audits Hours * Confirmation rate of the Hours Correspondence value)

team_activities_percentage.placeholder_text: Widget is empty. Select the teams in the filter, to see their statistics

team_comparison.placeholder_text: Widget is empty. Select the teams in the filter, to see their statistics

hours_correspondence.confirmation_rate_error: The Confirmation Rate should be number from 1 to 100
hours_correspondence.gap_cover_error: The gaps should cover the full interval from 1% to 100%. Please add or edit the gaps.
hours_correspondence.gap_pattern_error: The Gap should be in the range of numbers from 1 to 100, example 1-100
hours_correspondence.gap_min_max_value_error: Second value shouldn`t be higher or equal to the first value.

seniority_bonuses.interval_error: The value cannot be lower or equal to the previous value
seniority_bonuses.info_tooltip_text: The interval will be closed with the nearest starting value of another interval. If its starting value is the highest of all the intervals (or it is the only interval), this interval will be considered endless.

preset_working_hours_table.hours_pattern_error: Wrong pattern, enter integer or the fractional number, example: 0.00 or 0.0
preset_working_hours_table.hours_value_error: The value must be a multiple of 25
preset_working_hours_table.modal_notification_exceeds: The total duration exceeds 8 hours. Are you sure you want to save the table?
preset_working_hours_table.modal_notification_less: The total duration is less than 8 hours. Are you sure you want to save the table?

pending_users_table.title: Specify the users' settings
pending_users_table.subtitle: Please, select a role for each user. Some roles can be preselected based on the user's level - you can change the selection, if necessary. Also, you can mark the user as "Preset working hours" if this user does not fill in the corporate Jira. In this case, the system will use the time set for such users in the special settings table "Preset working hours".
pending_users_table.modal_info_tooltip_text: “This user misses team/level. You can select only Manager or Admin roles for such users“

pending_users_stop_saving_modal.notification_title: Are you sure you want to stop saving data for these users:
pending_users_stop_saving_modal.notification_not_save_title: The data storage for the users:

users_info_modal.title: User info
users_info_modal.notification_reset_password_button: A new password was sent to user. You cannot reset password more that once in the current window.
users_info_modal.notification_update_avatar_button: You cannot request a new photo more than once in the current window.
users_info_modal.empty_user_name_error: The User Name cannot be empty
users_info_modal.modal_info_title_reset_password: Are you sure you want to reset the password for the user
users_info_modal.modal_info_subtitle_reset_password: ? A new password will be generated and sent to the user.
users_info_modal.modal_info_title_update_photo: Are you sure you want to update the photo for the user
users_info_modal.modal_info_subtitle_update_photo: ? A new photo will be requested from Jira.
users_info_modal.request_title: *A request for a new photo was sent to Jira

add_new_user_modal.username_length_error: length of username must be between 5 and 50
add_new_user_modal.username_response_error: Username is occupied. Please change it.
add_new_user_modal.email_response_error: User with this email already exists.
add_new_user_modal.password_length_error: length of password must be between 8 and 40
add_new_user_modal.password_info: Length of password must be between 8 and 40.
add_new_user_modal.title: New User
add_new_user_modal.preset_working_hours_info: Set when the auditor/team lead uses the third-party time-management system instead of a corporate Jira project
add_new_user_modal.team_error_tooltip_second_part: already has a Team Lead. Please, select a different team or update the team settings in the PropertyView system.
